title: Haru ni Arashi: Honya-san de Go! 2
original_name: 春に嵐 本屋さんで GO!2
sinopse:
Under the unrelenting pursuit of the amorous Takashi of the PPC Publisher, the beautiful mega-bookstore manager, Satou Sho, had finally fallen in love! And that is when Satou's ex-lover and former boss came back...

(Source: MU)
